body: Heavy-duty use. Storage at over 30 °C ambient temperature. Prolonged storage in a completely charged or completely discharged state. Parking of the eBike in the blazing sun
contentHtml: Heavy-duty use. Storage at over 30 °C ambient temperature. Prolonged storage in a completely charged or completely discharged state. Parking of the eBike in the blazing sun
title: Factors that shorten the service life
